str2: (a) of two: another, a second, (b) other, different, (c) one's neighbor. Of uncertain affinity; other or different.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Neuter 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Other, another (of more than two), different. A primary word; 'else, ' i.e. Different.
From charizomai; a gratuity, i.e. Deliverance;, a endowment, i.e. religious qualification, or miraculous faculty.
Healing, curing, remedy. From iaomai; a cure.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
